column4: what is a nice command line client for instant messenging to yahoo and google talk?
i'm not sure one even exists
intellectual propery and open source don't exactly go hand in hand -- and the number of linux users is not a significant enough for them to cater to the linux community (yet)
you are right... i tossed a stupid adsl modem that won't work with linux after trying to persuade the customer service for a while to get a driver out
